pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Baby Relax Bath Oil 125ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Help baby relax with the Oil Garden Baby Bath Oil.

Warnings

STORE BELOW 30°C. NOT TO BE TAKEN ORALLY. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. AVOID CONTACT WITH EYES.

Common Uses

Bath Oil

Ingredients

Sweet Orange (Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Peel Oil), Australian Mandarin (Citrus Nobilis Peel Oil), Geranium (Pelargonium Graveolens Leaf Oil), Lavender (Lavandula Angustifolia Oil), Roman Chamomile (Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil) and Rose Otto (Rosa Damascena Flower Oil) combined with natural carrier oils of Sunflower (Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil), Grapeseed (Vitis Vinifera Seed Oil), Jojoba (Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil) and Sweet Almond (Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil) with a naturally derived solubiliser (C12-13 Pareth-3) stabilised with Vitamin E (Tocopherol).

Directions

Once bath or tub is full add 1-2tbs of bath oil into water. The oil will activate with the water, turning your child?s bath into a luxurious and relaxing space.
